channel.title: The torrent needs more peers...
channel.description: I tried the .zip files, which were difficult. So I took the advice and downloaded the torrent, but there are no peers with this one. :/ What ever happened to downloading things from a website's download provider, that says, "sign up for premium for faster downloads," but instead I just wait in line?

item.title: The torrent needs more peers...
item.dc:creator: Barnacle_Jim
item.description:
I just finished downloading a different torrent (from here, another official mirror) which included the same files so I can seed the main torrent.

(also most likely no one knows me since 1. I was never really a regular here, and 2. I changed my name/avi to match my Steam.)

Read full topic

item.title: The torrent needs more peers...
item.dc:creator: Subliminal
item.description:
this is so ridiculous. by the time I get to part 2, each of the different links still bring me to the beginning of the installation with “couldn’t find the file, did you download it?”

Why is BMS so difficult to download?

Read full topic

item.title: The torrent needs more peers...
item.dc:creator: CatzEyes93
item.description:
Part of the problem is that of the three files needed for the game, one of those files is 3 gigs. This is huge. Humongous. Big. Monster. And a dreadfully long download for some people.

A few weeks ago, I tried every single link on this spreadsheet https://bit.ly/1D7bHqJ with the exception of the torrent links. I was able to verify that the downloads DO work, although each of them took at least an hour of downloading on my ‘high speed’ internet. So if there is a continuing problem with the links, I can only guess it is as a result of a bad connection, nerfed bandwidth or other standard issue you might see when attempting to download a 3 gig file.

Regarding the torrent… I HAVE heard the complaint that no one is seeding it. I personally have yet to get on the torrent bandwagon otherwise I would do this ‘seeding’ you speak of.

Perhaps others that are reading this thread could perhaps do their part and seed it for the fanbase? Pretty please? :love:

Read full topic
